Salesforce Components - BillSelector
Overview    Classes    Enums    Interfaces    Triggers    SObjects    Groups    Index




Class BillSelector

public inherited sharing class BillSelector

Runs queries on the Bill__c custom object

Change History

06/20/2021 Initial version.
07/19/2021 Methods getBills() and getBillsWithPayments().
09/09/2021 getBills(), getBillsWithPayments(): Add field BlazeBiteFixedFees__c.
09/28/2021 getBills(), getBillsWithPayments(): Add field NumberOfPaymentsCharged__c.
09/29/2021 getBills(), getBillsWithPayments(): Add field NumberOfPaymentsRefunded__c.
06/15/2024 getBills(), getBillsWithPayments(): Add fields ProcessingFees__c and Account__r.BlazeBiteFeesIncludeCreditCardFees__c.
update API version to 60. Add new comments style.
06/16/2024 getBillsToCalculateCommissionsFor(): New method to query the Bill__c object with account agents and total.
08/26/2024 getBillByDates(): New method to query the Bill__c object for a given account Id and date range.

Result
 

Methods

public static BillSelector.Result getBillAccount(Id billId)

Queries the Account__c field for a given bill Id

Parameters:
    billId – Id of the bill to query the Account__c field for

Returns:
    Result object containing the queried records

public static BillSelector.Result getBillByDates(
  String accountId,
  Date dateFrom,
  Date dateTo
)

Queries the Bill__c object for a given account Id and date range

Parameters:
    accountId – String: The account Id to query bills for.
    dateFrom – Date: The start date of the date range.
    dateTo – Date: The end date of the date range.

Returns:
    Result object containing the queried records

public static BillSelector.Result getBills(List<String> billIds)

Queries the Bill__c object for a given list of bill Ids

Parameters:
    billIds – List<String> bill Ids to query

Returns:
    Result object containing the queried records

public static BillSelector.Result getBillsToCalculateCommissionsFor(List<String> billIds)

Queries the Bill__c object with account agents and total collected amount for a given list of bill Ids

Parameters:
    billIds – List<String> bill Ids to query

Returns:
    Result object containing the queried records

public static BillSelector.Result getBillsWithPayments(List<String> billIds)

Queries the Bill__c object with payment info for a given list of bill Ids

Parameters:
    billIds – List<String> bill Ids to query

Returns:
    Result object containing the queried records
